DOC.detailed_description: The HIP PRO Study randomize , control trial efficacy trochanteric padding system reduction hip fracture nursing home resident age 65 45 nursing home three region : Boston , MA , St. Louis , MO , Baltimore , MD . Eligible resident facility screen evaluate two week run-in period hip protection compliance rate least 67 % require enrollment . Recruitment eligible resident enter nursing home continue throughout 3.5 year follow-up period . Each subject give set 4-6 protective underwear contain single pocket protective pad resident become his/her control . The side protect base randomization nursing home facility either right left-sided hip protection . The hip protection underwear design may wear day bed night . Several type underwear design resident special need ( e.g . incontinence , dementia ) . Compliance efficacy monitor least three time weekly across three nursing shift . A hip fracture adjudication committee , blind side fracture , review information ( include hospital record radiologist ' report hip radiograph ) issue decision whether fracture occur . Primary analysis perform use `` intention treat '' approach . Secondary analysis investigate resident nursing home factor associate hip protection compliance effectiveness . An independent Data Safety Monitoring Board ( DSMB ) convene review hip fracture rate adverse event data regular interval . Institutions participate HIP PRO : Data Coordinating Center Maryland Medical Research Institute Baltimore , MD ; three Clinical Centers Washington University School Medicine St. Louis , MO , University Maryland Baltimore , MD University North Carolina Chapel Hill , NC , Hebrew Rehabilitation Center Aged Boston , MA . The Data Coordinating Center direct overall administrative management trial .
